channel.title: (pi) cache help
channel.description:
i need help with my cache it doesnt download correctly. it downloads into my (c:/) drive but then it creates the cache inside another folder. i either need help changing the path of the cache or fixing this problem. Look in the attachment if you don't know what i mean
What i want is the folder inside the cache to be the only folder so when you open the folder called "koriscapePK" in the (c:/) drive it will look like the picture on the right of the attachment instead of the one at the bottom leftv

item.title: (pi) cache help
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

I have the same prob, it’s because that cache.zip won’t unzip, idk how to fix tho

Read full topic
